title: Exercise & Fitness Resources
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: American College of Sports Medicine
content: Education about benefits of physical activity at all ages -- that's the focus of this group of doctors, educators, and researchers. This link will take you to its website.

content_blocks.text: Education about benefits of physical activity at all ages -- that's the focus of this group of doctors, educators, and researchers. This link will take you to its website.

sections.heading: American Council on Exercise
content: If you're looking for motivation -- or for a personal trainer -- this organization can get you started. This link will take you to its website.

content_blocks.text: If you're looking for motivation -- or for a personal trainer -- this organization can get you started. This link will take you to its website.

sections.heading: Council on Physical Fitness and Sports
content: Get exercise guidance from the top. This website addresses exercise challenges for people in all age groups. Follow this link.
President’s Council on Physical Fitness and Sports

sections.heading: American Physical Therapy Association’s “Move Forward”
content: MoveForwardPT.com is the consumer information website providing health-related information on physical therapy and movement.
